name: Cats Huddled Together 挤在一起的猫猫们
name_original: Cats Huddled Together 挤在一起的猫猫们
description:
Welcome to "Cats Huddled Together"
This is a cat-themed jigsaw puzzle game where each piece features an adorable cat. It requires your patience and dexterity to bring the cats together. Come and take up the challenge!

-----Game Controls------

- Drag the puzzle pieces with the left mouse button.
- Rotate the puzzle pieces with the right mouse button.
- Press the Q key to hide or show the game UI.
- You can toggle the cat sound effects on or off in the settings.

-----Game Features------

- 1,000 adorable hand-drawn cats.
- 24 levels with varying numbers of pieces.
- An immersive puzzle experience.
- Cute cat sound effects.
- Relaxing background music.

------------------------
